job description:
Senior Java Developer (Contract)

Technology is changing our lives faster than ever before. We swipe for food, tap for transportation and click for clothing. We put on goggles to see distant worlds, we can create a masterpiece with our finger, and relive our favorite memory with a video.

The ideal candidate must be an artist coding with Java on the server-side plus have a knack for re-architecture and handling projects almost solo as part of a small team. Thepany is a good client of ours and the role itself has a good chance to go full hire, so if you have a strong work ethic and a healthy interest in the role then definitely hit that apply button.

Required Skills & Experience
  • 4-5 years of experience as a software developer
  • Strong Java,Spring,AWS background
  • Strong experience working on server-side development and re-architecture
  • Experience building web-services
  • Experience with Spring and Hibernate
  • Familiarity working with open-source Big Data technologies is a plus
  • Familiarity with Cassandra, AWS, and Google cloud
    • Desired Skills & Experience
  • Ability to handle projects as an individual contributor
  • Highly motivated
  • Working as part of a small team
    • What You Will Be Doing

    Tech Breakdown
  • 70% Java
  • 20% Spring and Hibernate
  • 10% AWS
    • Daily Responsibilities
  • 75% Coding
  • 10% Solutions and testing, problem-solving
  • 10% Coordinating with team
  • 5% Reporting to superior
    • The Offer
  • Contract Duration: 6 9 Months
  • High probability to go full-time
    • You will receive the following benefits:
  • Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)
  • 401(k)
  • Paid Sick Time Leave
  • Pre-taxmuter Benefit
